articles.description: On a night when so many stars delivered in the Class 3A state wrestling finals, Iowa City High's three champs may have shined the brightest.
articles.content: There have been ongoing, years-long arguments in Iowa high school wrestling circles about which class is the best class. Is it 1A, with its tiny-but-mighty programs? Is it 2A, which often fields powe… [+9559 chars]
